Menu sarapan di resto Kenanga, favorit saya empal gentong, lagi2 enak dan dagingnya juga lembut, sedangkan menu favorit anak saya adalah waffle, manisnya pas dan lembut. Ada area healthy club, yang terdiri dari Pelangi Pool, ada 2 pool, pool dewasa dan pool anak, yang seru dengan pancuran air nya, jogging track yang cukup panjang dengan view gedung, area hijau untuk beanbag, fitness centre atau gym yang lengkap. Lelah berolah raga, kemudian bisa mampir ke warung starling untuk makan indomie. Untuk anak2 tersedia juga indoor playground yang lengkap dan bersih. Petugas hotel yang sangat ramah dan helpfull, seperti mba Emily dari CRO dan mas Asmat (Boby) dari FB service sangat diacungi jempol 👍🏻 rekomen sekali untuk family staycation .

text:
Menginap di hotel legendaris yang ada di Jakarta selatan.fasilitasnya sangat family friendly loh. Di lobby nya ada ice cream gratis, di lantai 3 nya ada mini playground dan kolam renang yang cukup besar dengan kolam anak yang ada pancurannya gitu asik banget yaa.untuk urusan kebugaran juga ada jogging track yang cukup luas dan area fitnesnya yang lengkap banget nih.  Bisa jadi pilihan staycation bareng keluarga deh pokoknya.

Untuk pilihan tempat ngopi dan makannya juga ada beberapa, seperti anggrek lounge yang cocok untuk dinner sambil ditemani live music, bio kopi untuk nyatai dengan pilihan menu coffenya. Serta kenagan resto yang punya pilihan sarapan yang lengkap banget deh.

text: Dah jadi SOP saat pesan hotel di manapun cari review restoran sama kolam renangnya. Kalau sudah cocok langsung capcus😁.  ini adalah  ke sekian kali keluarga kami menginap di Bidakara Grand Pancoran. Lokasinya relatif terjangkau karena letaknya di pusat kota, mau ke mana-mana dekat. Ke GI tinggal geser☺️, restorannya besar dan pilihan makanannya banyak. Kata anak saya Jilly (4,6 Y) mbak-mbaknya masaknya enak-enak , sambil Lep lep makan dimsum, sushi, jajanan pasar dan lain-lain. Doyan apa lapar bu Haji ?

Hotel lama tapi fasilitas lumayan, salah satunya terintegrasi dengan semacam mall di bawah dan berada di salah satu pusat kota jakarta selatan.

Ruang kamar tidur cukup nyaman namun kamar mandi tipe lama. Untuk makanan saat sesi sarapan cukup lengkap dan enak. Yang menarik dari hotel ini adalah di lantai bawah, masjidnya lumayan besar sehingga memudahkan bagi tamu hotel untuk melaksanakan ibadah.

Kekurangan paling fatal dari hotel ini adalah toilet luar yang dikunci jika malam, bahkan di bawah jam 9 malam sudah dikunci. Pengalaman saya pernah workshop sampai malam kemudian sholat di mushola lantai atas, namun toiletnya sudah dikunci, toilet umum lantai lain juga sama. Ini sungguh pengalaman paling konyol selama menginap di hotel.

text:
Saya menginap di hotel ini untuk satu malam. Tapi itu cukup untuk pertama dan terakhir kali saya menginap di hotel ini.

Untuk fasiltas dan lainnya saya tidak ingin review karena pasti sudah bnyk yg kasih review. 

Untuk kali ini saya hanya akan review mengenai kinerja para staffnya yang benar2 sangat tidak profesional baik dari level staff sampai managernya. 

Saya memberikan review seperti ini karena staff hotel yang dengan lancang masuk kekamar pada  saat saya lagi tidur. Hal ini dilakukan dengan alasan pengecekan kamar. Seumur hidup saya baru kali ini ada staff hotel yang dengan lancang masuk kekamar tanpa izin. Seharusnya hal seperti ini tidak perlu terjadi. Karena pengecekan kamar yg kosong atau tidak seharusnya tidak dilakukan secara manual. Pada saat ditegor para bagian cleaning tidak meminta maaf dan mengatakan hal itu merupakan standar dari hotel. Saya heran dan sangat kecewa ini hotel bintang 4 apakah sama sekali tidak ada standarisasinya.

Hal yang lebih mengecewakan adalah sikap dari duty manager yang lebih tidak profesional yang dengan sikap arogan dan ketusnya dalam mengahadapi permasalahan ini. Tidak ada permintaan maaf yg tulus. Malah memberikan alasan tadi saya habis keliling tidak ada masalah. Untuk apa melakukan pengecekan klu hal seperti ini dibiarkan terjadi.

Untuk management hotel harap para staffnya diberikan training agar bisa bersikap lebih baik dan tau bagaimana cara menghandle keluhan dari customer terutama untuk duty managernya. Level manager harusnya sudah menguasai hal ini.

Seandainya ada rating bintang nol. Pasti rating itu yg akan saya pilih. Karena sebuah hotel harusnya bisa dengan baik menjaga privacy dari para tamu hotelnya. Dan kesalahan dari hotel kali ini saya anggap sangat fatal. Semoga hal ini tidak terjadi kepada para tamu hotel lainnya.
title: Staff Hotel Tidak Sopan

Termasuk hotel lama yang sudah cukup dikenal jadi tidak sulit bagi sopir taksi membawa kami menuju kesini. Kamar yg kami tempati cukup luas, lega dengan jendela yang cukup lebar (saya penggemar kamar dg jendela). Lantai kamar berlapis karpet. Tersedia di kamar air minum dlm kemasan 2 botol 600 ml (standar hotel pd umumnya), ketel pemasak air, persediaan teh, kopi, gula, gula aren dan gula rendah kalori. Kondisi cukup bersih. 
Area kamar mandi cukup lega dg letak shower dipisah oleh pintu bertirai dg area WC. Perlengkapan mandi komplit. 
Terdapat pula lemari pakaian. 
Utk area lobi hotel sangat luas. Disediakan welcome drink, proses check in cepat, staf ramah yg membantu membawakan barang hingga ke kamar. 
Terdapat kolam renang outdoor yg bagus, dikelilingi taman yg luas dan indah dan staf yg ramah. Mungkin orang tidak menyadari kalau kolam dan taman ini berada di lantai 3 gedung hotel. Terdapat area bermain anak, ruangan fitnes dan spa.

Hotel bintang 4 di kawasan perkantoran dan dekat dengan beberapa kedutaan besar negara sahabat. Lokasi agak kedalam di belakang menara bidakara. Tidak ada convenient store, resto, atau sejenisnya buat makan yang dengan jakak walking distance dari hotel.

Waktu check in cepat dan saya dapat kamar sesuai dengan permintaan saya. Namun sayang front desk staff kurang ramah. Saya tidak disambut, tidak ditawarkan welcome drink, dan kurang hospitality. Staff housekeeping dan security jauh lebih professional dibanding front desk staff. 

Untuk sarapan, tempat gym, dan swimming pool saya sempat mencobanya. 

Saya mungkin akan kembali

Agak bau lembab dari karpet bulu ketika memasuki ruang kamar, yang teratasi dgn menyalanya AC (saya sangat suka dengan aroma rempah sereh di hotel Bumi Surabaya, tak saya dapatkan disini), makanan yang kami pesan sop buntut sangat enak, sayangnya soto ayam dan sanwichnya kurang mengena dilidah. sofarrrr sih enaklah buat bersantai karena cukup bersih dan terawat.

text:
Kami menginap awalnya memesan deluxe room utk 1 mlm karena pernikahan sepupu pd tgl 1 maret 2015 di Binakarna. Ternyata begitu kami masuk kamarnya luas saya memesan double yg saya rasa sepertinya lebih kecil ukurannya dr queen krn lebar tempat tidur pas 2 bantal -/+ 150m dan kamar mandi sempit yg bgitu terkesan gelap dan tua. Krn kami menginap dengan anak kami yg berumur 1th tdk mungkin mandi dengan shower menempel di tembok sehingga saya memutuskan pindah kamar yaitu kekamar executive room yg memiliki bathub. Oke saya mulai dengan penilaian yg baik: 
+ proses check in cepat
+ kamar executive jauh lebih luas dari kamar deluxe, dan tempat tdrnya queen 160
+ memiliki sofa 2seater 
+ full carpet dan sepertinya utk executive room newly renovated
+ LCD TV 32" 
+ 10fl, sehingga view terlihat lebih baik
+ kamar mandi lebih luas sedikit dari deluxe room dan ada bathub yg modelnya sudah lawas sekali tetapi tetap bersih dan well maintain terlihat tirai shower yg putih spt baru
+ sarapan bervariasi tetapi rasa biasa saja, saya senang ada buah2an spt pear, jeruk sunkist dan salad bar
+ pool terbagi 3 : adult 1.8 M, toddler 1.4 M, babies 70 M 
+ bell boy yg sangat membantu dan reseptionist yg ramah dan cekatan
+ Tersedia baby Crib yg menurut saya sangat baik karena di sekelilingnya dilingkari bantal pelindung dan pastinya bersih

Nah untuk penilaian yg kurang baik menurut saya

- setelah check in saya hrs menunggu sekitar 20 menit utk meminta bellboy antarkan koper kami ke kamar yg mungkin saya kurang tahu apakah hotel bintang 4 ini hanya memiliki bellboy sedikit??
- Resto apa namanya saya lupa yg posisinya pas berhadapan dengan receptionist saat kami ingin makan siang pelayannya tdk cekatan utk menawarkan menu, sunggu aneh dan kami melihat memang tdk ada satupun tamu yg sedang makan 
- furniture kamar yg sudah terlihat tua terutama bagian pintu masuk, beberapa kalo key card kami tdk bisa membuka pintu krn gagang pintu yg sudah kendor dan kebetulan saat kami kesulitan membuka pintu selalu ada cleaning service yg ada di lt. 10 
- kolam renang kotor, apalagi kolam babies nya byk sekali pasir dan daun2 jatuh spt tdk rutin dibersihkan
- arena bermain anak di lt.3 juga kurang terawat, karpet busa sudah hitam2 dan kotor
- saat makan pagi saya ingin makan waffle yg masih hangat dan saat saya ingin minta yg baru dimasak sang pelayan(perempuan) terlihat mukanya tdk enak padahal apa susahnya masakin 1 waffle toh juga dia tdk sedang ngapa2in dan saya liat ternyata trainnie wah seharusnya kl msh trainnie hrsnya didampingi dengan yg sdh terlatih spy tdk sembarang bersikap terhadap para tamu. 

Sekian dari penilaian saya tentang hotel bidakara. Sepertinya utk hotel bintang 4 maaf tdk memenuhi kriteria saya, krn seperti menginap hotel berbintang 3 atau 3.5
title: Hotel sudah berumur

text: Lokasi hotel ini cukup strategis, di daerah Pancoran. Saya bersyukur calon istri saya waktu itu bisa mendapatkan hotel ini. Stafnya sangat membantu, dan persiapan pernikahan kami ditangani dengan profesional. Pernikahan kami diadakan sabtu siang (jam 11-13); karena diadakan siang maka ruangan kami (ruang Binakarna) dapat digunakan secara gratis di pagi harinya untuk acara akad nikah. Cukup banyak yg didapatkan untuk harga yg ditawarkan: 3 kamar utk satu malam, diskon 50% untuk kamar yg dipesan utk keluarga, ruang gratis (bila acara siang) dan makanan yang enak -jadi tidak perlu repot dengan koordinasi dengan kateringnya-! Satu dari tiga kamar gratis tersebut bergaya apartment dengan ruang tamu dan pantry area, cocok utk bersantai bersama keluarga (keluarga besar maupun keluarga baru -bersama pasangan, maksudnya) setelah acara pernikahan yang melelahkan..:)

text:
Baru- baru ini selama 6 minggu saya ditempatkan kerjanya di Jakarta dan sebelumnya pernah menginap di hotel berbintang 5. Tempatnya bagus, terdapat di Jakarta, New York, Glasgow atau di manapun di dunia. Letaknya lebih dari 5 km dari tempat di mana pernah saya bekerja yang berarti butuh naik taksi atau naik kendaraan antara 20 menit sampai 2 jam tergantung kondisi lalu lintas. Jadi selama perjalanan itu saya menginap di hotel Bidakara yang berada di dalam kompleks pertokoan, kafe dll. Hotel Bidakara berada di Pancoran daerah selatan Jakarta, kurang dari 10  menit dari tempat kerja saya. Sekarang kenyamanannya baik, sarapannya hebat, menu makan malamnya kurang begitu ada yang disukai, tetapi yang terbaik dari hotel ini adalah staf nya yang ramah dan penolong. Walaupun ada sesuatu yang kurang pasti saat saya menginginkan sesuatu, staf nya melakukan hal yang terbaik dan membuat 6 minggu saya di sana terasa senang dan ringan. Hotelnya mempunyai kolam renang yang nyaman di luar ruangan, ruang kebugaran yang sempit  (yang hanya sedikit orang menggunakannya) dan dekor yang agak ketinggalan jaman tapi saya langsung terbiasa dan memandangnya sebagai sebuah keuntungan. Jadi tidak usah menginap di Bidakara jika anda menginginkan fasilitas kelas dunia (tentu saja dengan harga kelas dunia ), tetapi jika anda menginginkan kepraktisan, keramahan dan kompetensi saya merekomendasikan hotel ini. 
Dan akhirnya, setiap minggu di hotel Bidakara ini diselenggarakan pesta pernikahan dengan penuh warna dan menarik, yang bisa menjadi hiburan gratis anda.
title: Jika anda lelah dengan hotel bisnis biasa

text:
stayed in this hotel for a business trip for 4 days. my first impression was this is an old hotel. however the service is above my expectations. i reached the hotel late at night on the first day. when i checked into my room, some of the lights are not working. i made a comment to the bellboy who escorted me to my room. i thought it will only be fixed tomorrow since it was really late, but the technician actually came after that. and he even waited outside until i answered the door as i was in the shower (couldnt hear the bell in the beginning so he actually waited for a good 10 minutes or so). the staff are very friendly. despite it is an old hotel, the air con works perfectly. wifi is free and smooth. the one thing that i was unsatisfied with is the water flow from the shower room. i think it was partially clogged as the water didnt flow out fast enough so at some point the shower room was flooded with water. 
the location is great as it is located at south jakarta but away from the hustle n bustle of the city so it is peaceful. there is a few cafes including starbucks downstairs. my office is just behind at menara bidakara 2 so it is a 5 minutes walk from the hotel to my office. the location also makes it easy for grab or go-jek to find.
title: Good Business Hotel with Excellent Service

text:
The Bidakara is one of the few decent hotels with a good location and with a swimming pool available at a moderate price in Jakarta. A central location is a matter of opinion in sprawling Jakarta, but if you want access to the central business district and South Jakarta shopping and residential areas, Pancoran is ideal. FaveHotel in Kemang and Harris in Tebet were alternative considerations (with comparable pool, location, price). But I chose Bidakara because it had bigger rooms and a good included breakfast buffet.

The pool was wonderful (open 6am-9pm) and the buffet was excellent (both Western and Indonesian options, including bubur and jamu!). The staff were friendly and helpful within their limitations. The lobby and common areas were well-appointed and clean. The rooms were indeed spacious (with a sofa even), with good city views. It's a shame the rooms have no balconies, because there would have been space for them. Beds were comfortable, linens clean, mini-fridge functional, AC functional and quiet, plenty of drawers and closet space.

The hotel adjoins a small mall, with a convenience store and a travel agency and other stores, including a Starbucks which I never visited. (Many of the stores have gone out of business so it's a bit of a ghost town mall.) Ekspres Taxis (reputable) line up at the lobby. None of the staff snubbed their nose at me for occasionally ordering a go-jek (online ojek motorcycle taxi).

However, there were plenty of frustrations that would make me think twice about returning, despite the paucity of alternatives meeting my criteria. (Though I'd probably still return if price remains around US$50/night.) Primarily, over 5 nights i was never able to have a hot shower. The water was "fixed" twice but never working when I actually wanted a shower. I had problems with wifi access (needed to switch rooms, then OK). There are scores of wifi networks in the hotel and each requires periodic (tho simple) re-login. Then there was an electrical outlets that didn't work (fixed), a coffee maker that didn't work (fixed and then not working again), and a light bulb that burned out. There was no available laundry line other than towel rack, no safe in the room (safety deposit at front desk), no money changing at desk, no caddy in shower (body wash on the floor). Extra services (laundry, pool dining) were 5-star hotel priced. (Entertaining a few friends at the pool with drinks and some food and snacks cost over $60.) No discount was offered for inconveniences; a room upgrade request after initial room problems was denied (lack of on-duty manager at night.)

Finally, the smoking situation is hilarious. Bidakara has become a "non-smoking" hotel, despite the fact that it's apparent that tens of thousands of packs of cigarettes have been smoked in every room over the years. The rooms didn't particularly smell, but the wear on the carpets and walls show the signs. Furthermore, people clearly still smoke in the rooms anyway, as kretek can be smelled in the halls. As a smoker who understands it sucks to smoke in non-ventilated AC rooms (windows do not open), I followed the rules and smoked in the outside area by the bar, but that was a pain at times. There were mosquitos there and the bug-light did not eliminate them and they did not burn mosquito coils (or have them). You can smoke at the pool also but it closes at 9 pm. 

Finally it should be mentioned that this hotel has always been known for functions (weddings, etc). When I stayed there in late December 2015 it was mostly filled by state officials trying to finish off annual budgets. I believe I was one of 2 foreigners staying there at the time. That doesn't bother me, but you'll be more comfortable there if you are used to Indonesian ways and aren't overly bothered by unmet expectations.
title: 4 Star at 2 Star Price Really 3 Star at Best

text: I stayed here on a business trip. It was my third trip to Jakarta but my first time at the Bidakara Hotel. I chose the hotel primarily because the people I was visiting had their office right next door in the Bidakara Tower. In Jakarta that's a huge advantage because the traffic is completely insane. The hotel is a decent one. My room (429) was spacious and comfortable. The WiFi was good and fast and free  - another critical area for me because  I need to stay connected. The staff were friendly but their English wasn't great which made communication difficult at times e.g. I asked for tea at breakfast and, after consulting a colleague, the server got me a cup of coffee instead, and the gentleman at room service who told me he would call me back and never did (I'm giving him the benefit of the doubt and putting that one down to language and not to rudeness because the staff at the hotel were all quite personable). The breakfast buffet was pretty decent as well but it could use some variety and the food is spread out over different parts of the dining area which is a little inconvenient. My real problem with the hotel was the food. It's overpriced, quite terrible, and in my one experience at the coffee shop, took entirely too long to arrive. There is a Pizza Hut nearby as well as some Padang food options so after a couple of bad experiences with the options in the hotel, I opted to just get dinner outside and would stay here again if most of my work was in this part of town.
title: Good location, friendly staff, terrible food

I recently stayed for the holidays. The room was clean and spacious. The first impression of your stay which is typically at check-in can sometimes make or break an experience, she made a difference and because of her, the experience went from great to superb.

text:
I stayed at the hotel on a week long business trip to Jakarta. The hotel is really conveniently located, and was right next door to our meeting location. But even if you had to go somewhere in town, there is a BlueBird taxi stand right outside. 

The rooms were larger than most business hotels and had really comfortable beds. The staff accommodated every request that one made to make the stay comfortable. Emily and Wahyu at Guest Relations were super helpful in helping me to checkin and out smoothly. It is really amazing how they remember guest names without having to refer to a CRM tool. Really personalised service. 

The breakfast spread is really wide and I tried quite a few traditional Indonesian dishes too. The regular Continental breakfast is also available but quite frankly I would recommend the traditional one. I also ordered traditional food through room service and the food was equally amazing. 

Look forward to staying here again. The pricing is also quite economical. No reason to look elsewhere, really.
title: Great location, rooms and staff ! Highly recommended

text:
It was my first stay in Bidakara hotel. This hotel is old but well maintained. Even some national events took place here.
My first impression was fast check in process then as I entered the room I found it spacious and clean. 
All rooms there are non smoking. But there were some smoking area in Kenanga restaurant and Anggrek restaurant.
I like spending time in Anggrek restaurant enjoying good food and live music. My favorite was nasi kapau dendeng balado, it was like Padang cuisine. I loved the taste and presentation. My favorite drinks there were black coffee of course and chocolate ginger. 
A friend of mine told me that the pindang patin and salmon steak were great. But unfortunately I don't like fish. Wanted to have a bite though some time. 
The breakfast in Kenanga restaurant was also great, various tasty breakfast. I really enjoyed having some traditional snacks like bakwan and pancong cake. I also like the dim sum really. But the croissant was not that crunchy. They have west meet east breakfast. They were all good. 
I was also impressed with the patience from Shinta, Minar and Nisah when I needed this and that in restaurant. They were good asset for the management I think. There was also a lady greeted me, Anita as I recalled. But I think she was a part of management from the uniform she wore.
All staffs there were also friendly and helpful. Yanti and shinta was helpful and always smiled. Made me felt at home already. Nur from housekeeping was also fast delivering my request of praying mat and sarong.
Besides good cleanliness, hot water and cold aircon in my room which I loved, I think they need to improve their internet connection. It was not fast enough for data communication like sending attachments through e mail and Whatapps.
Well, overall my three days stay was impressive. I will surely come back one day to have good dinner and live music in Anggrek restaurant.
title: Impressive

text: For me, Grand Bidakara Pancoran has good location, not too far from office center in Kuningan. Few days ago, I brought my wife and children there, and it was okay. The swimming pool and playground is good, although it was not big. I love breakfast menu in this hotel, suitable for Indonesian food fans. Unfortunately, the room size is quite small, it need to be more developed. But overall, this hotel can be your choice for traveling in Jakarta with standard price.

text: Stayed for 3 nights at the Bidakaran Hotel Grand Pancoran whilst visiting family in Jakarta. The hotel is located in the business district of south Jakarta and offers the usual facilities and services associated with a four star hotel. Adjacent to it is an office building with shared access to several cafes such as Starbucks, a bakery, eateries serving local dishes, shops including a mini mart. Once inside, the hotel provides an oasis of calm away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Taxis are readily available to get to any part of the city but be aware to leave plenty of time due to Jakarta's slow moving traffic. The room I stayed in was clean and spacious with a generous double bed, a sitting and desk area and a walk-in shower room. A flat screen tv with full HD digital channels via Transvision (free Fox movies included) was a nice touch. Complimentary mineral water, tea and a small kettle were provided. The staff I met at reception and throughout my stay at Hotel Bidakaran were friendly and most gracious. All in all I had a pleasant stay at the hotel and I have therefore no hesitation to recommend it for a short stay or for anyone on business within the area.
title: Pleasant Hotel in South Jakarta Business Area

I traveled alone to jakarta and stay at this hotel for 1 night. The room was nice and clean. The breakfast in the morning was amazing. Many choices for the food and the tastes were good.

If you want to see main Jakarta attraction such as Monas, you have to take a taxi from hotel or take any public transportation to city centre. The good news is there are taxi standby 24 hours in front of hotel and it's just 10 min walking to nearest busway stop that can take you anywhere in Jakarta.
title: Nice breakfast but quite far from city centre

text: We stayed at Hotel Bidakara for 2 weeks for a family members wedding. The rooms were very comfortable, clean, and you have a great outlook onto Jakarta City. All of the staff members were extremely helpful, nothing was too much trouble. It was wonderful that they had a small children's play area, as well as a big outdoor pool. We spent most of our time here. The meals were slightly disappointing, so we went out for meals most days. However, the breakfasts in the morning were wonderful with plenty of healthy fruit, cereals as well as Indonesian cuisine as well which was very tasty. Overall we had a good experience here for a hotel that isn't really designed for Western tourists, it is really designed for travelling business people and for large wedding functions.
title: Suitable for business travellers, wedding functions but kind to overseas travellers

The function hall is quite famous in Jakarta due to the strategic location and abundant indoor parking lot, the soon to be married couple need to book it 1yr earlier if they want to held the party here. text:
You get what you pay for at the Bidakara. 
The hotel is a bit old and tired: stained carpet, sheets, corridors that smell like smoke, dirty and missing grouting in the shower. The sun-lit gymnasium is somewhat of a greenhouse with floor to ceiling windows, no airconditioning and rather old rusting equipment. The breakfast, as others have said, was a positive (but don't confuse the chocolate flavoured bread for rye bread as we did!). The hotel has a mini-mart in the basement that can provide you with snacks, beers etc. There are also a number of function rooms that  - when dressed up for a wedding reception - look amazing.
If you want a roof over your head then the Bidakara does the trick, but we won't be back.
title: Unlikely to return

text: I'm an Aussie and stayed in Jakarta for one night only to attend a wedding. The room was nice enough... clean and simple, although the shower cubicle was a little dirty and out dated looking. None of us could find a hair dryer in our rooms. This seemed very unusual. I can only assume they are more used to business men as clients, rather than girls! Bed was hard but that's typical of many hotels in Asia. Loud call to prayer woke us in the early hours, but that didn't worry me too much, it's all part of the cultural experience. Cafe/bar downstairs ran out of beer after a group of Aussies ordered one each! They did not offer any other type of alcohol- only beer. Breakfast was a decent buffet, with lots on offer. The guy cooking the pancakes looked put out that we wanted some however, and ignored us until he realised we weren't going anywhere till we got some! Reception staff were lovely and friendly however. At $60/night, this hotel is cheap and decent enough for a short stay.
title: Nice enough... but where is the hair dryer??!
